componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

vinTyp.description: typical input voltage under which a device can be expected to operate without output dropping

vinMin.description: minimum input voltage under which a device can be expected to operate without output dropping

vinMax.description: maximum input voltage under which a device can be expected to operate without output dropping

voutTyp.description: typical output voltage a device can regulate

voutMin.description: minimum output voltage a device can regulate

voutMax.description: maximum output voltage a device can regulate

feedbackVoltageTyp.description: typical voltage comparison point at the feedback node

feedbackVoltageMax.description: max voltage comparison point at the feedback node

feedbackVoltageMin.description: minimum voltage comparison point at the feedback node

loadCurrentTyp.description: typical load current supported by a device

loadCurrentMax.description: maximum load current supported by a device

loadCurrentMin.description: minimum load current supported by a device

voutAccuracyTyp.description: typical output voltage variation at no load

voutAccuracyMax.description: maximum output voltage variation at no load

voutAccuracyMin.description: minimum output voltage variation at no load

loadRegulationTyp.description: typical output voltage variation from no load to full load

loadRegulationMax.description: maximum output voltage variation from no load to full load

loadRegulationMin.description: minimum output voltage variation from no load to full load

lineRegulationTyp.description: typical output voltage variation from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage

lineRegulationMax.description: maximum output voltage variation from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage

lineRegulationMin.description: minimum output voltage variation from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage

enableTimeTyp.description: typical time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

enableTimeMax.description: max time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

enableTimeMin.description: minimum time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

rampTimeTyp.description: typical time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

rampTimeMax.description: maximum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

rampTimeMin.description: minimum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

integratedFets.description: whether the regulator contains integrated switching mosfets

integratedFetProperties.description: describes integrated fet current limits and rdson properties

componentProtectionThresholds.description: Thermal and power supply protection thresholds of a device

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties

componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

vinTyp.description: typical input voltage under which the part can be expected to operate without the output dropping

vinMin.description: minimum input voltage under which the part can be expected to operate without the output dropping

vinMax.description: maximum input voltage under which the part can be expected to operate without the output dropping

voutMin.description: minimum output voltage the part can regulate

voutMax.description: maximum output voltage the part can regulate

voutTyp.description: typical output voltage the part can regulate

feedbackVoltageTyp.description: typical voltage comparison point at the feedback node (vref)

feedbackVoltageMin.description: minimum voltage comparison point at the feedback node (vref)

feedbackVoltageMax.description: max voltage comparison point at the feedback node (vref)

dropoutVoltageTyp.description: typical dropout voltage of a device

dropoutVoltageMin.description: minimum dropout voltage of a device

dropoutVoltageMax.description: maximum dropout voltage of a device

LoadCurrentMax.description: maximum load current supported by a device

LoadCurrentMin.description: minimum load current supported by a device

currentLimitTyp.description: typical high sustained output current threshold beyond which the output of a device starts drooping

currentLimitMin.description: minimum high sustained output current threshold beyond which the output of a device starts drooping

currentLimitMax.description: maximum high sustained output current threshold beyond which the output of a device starts drooping

voutAccuracyTyp.description: typical output voltage variation at no load of a device

voutAccuracyMin.description: minimum output voltage variation at no load of a device

voutAccuracyMax.description: maximum output voltage variation at no load of a device

loadRegulationTyp.description: typical output voltage variation,from no load to full load, of a device

loadRegulationMin.description: minimum output voltage variation,from no load to full load, of a device

loadRegulationMax.description: maximum output voltage variation,from no load to full load, of a device

lineRegulationTyp.description: typical output voltage variation,from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage, of a device

lineRegulationMin.description: minimum output voltage variation,from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage, of a device

lineRegulationMax.description: maximum output voltage variation,from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage, of a device

enableTimeTyp.description: typical time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

enableTimeMin.description: minimum time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

enableTimeMax.description: maximum time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

rampTimeTyp.description: typical time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

rampTimeMin.description: minimum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

rampTimeMax.description: maximum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

powerSupplyRejectionRatio.description: graph object to capture Power Supply Rejection Ratio (PSRR) of device over various frequencies

rmsOutputNoise.description: graph object to capture RMS output noise of device over various frequencies

totalOutputNoise.description: total output noise of a device

componentProtectionThresholds.description: Thermal and power supply protection thresholds of a device

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties

componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

fetType.description: type of pass FET in a device

loadSwitchCount.description: number of load switched in the package.

vinTyp.description: typical input voltage under which a device can be expected to reliabily operate

vinMin.description: minimum input voltage under which a device can be expected to reliabily operate

vinMax.description: maximum input voltage under which the part can be expected to reliabily operate

OutputCurrentMax.description: maximum continuous DC cuurent supported by a device

oneResistanceTyp.comment: conditions includes vin and output current

onResistanceMax.comment: conditions include vin voltage and output current

onResistanceMin.comment: conditions include vin and output current

pdResistanceTyp.description: typical pull-down resistance of a device from the output to the ground

pdResistanceMax.description: maximum pull-down resistance of a device from the output to the ground

pdResistanceMin.description: minimum pull-down resistance of a device from the output to the ground

currentLimitSupport.description: whether a device supports current limiting

adjustableRiseTimeSupport.description: whether a device supports adjustable rise time

quickOutputDischargeSupport.description: whether a device supports quick output discharge

reverseCurrentBlockingSupport.description: whether a device supports reverse current blocking

powerGoodSupport.description: whether a device supports power good

enableTimeMin.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

enableTimeMax.description: maximum time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal
enableTimeMax.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

offTimeTyp.description: typical time between enable deasserted and output voltage falling to 90% nominal
offTimeTyp.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

offTimeMax.description: maximum time between enable deasserted and output voltage falling to 90% nominal
offTimeMax.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

offTimeMin.description: minimum time between enable deasserted and output voltage falling to 90% nominal

rampTimeTyp.comment: conditions include output capacitor value, vin

rampTimeMax.description: maximum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

fallTimeTyp.description: typical time for output voltage to go from 90% vout nominal to 10% vout nominal
